name: The Black Hole (itch)
description:
The Black Hole is a difficult catch game. In the space the Black Hole destroy all planet, and that's your job. You are the black hole and you can absorb all the planet. But if you don't correctly catch one of the planet, your score fall. 

For a better gameplay, play in 640x480 windowed ( or not windowed ).

 The game is not finish, also help me to improve it ( Trailer and more are in development ). In the futur, the game will be available in Apple App Store, Google Play and Amazon App Store.
